modifications: Extended AppState interface with mcpServers property
Added MCP server related actions to AppActions interface
Updated initialState with empty mcpServers array
Implemented setMcpServers, addMcpServer, updateMcpServer, and deleteMcpServer methods

patterns_discovered: Dynamic ID generation for new servers
Immutable state updates using spread operator
Timestamp tracking for server creation and updates
Generalized CRUD operations for server management
gotchas_discovered: No validation for MCP server configurations
Potential performance impact with large number of servers
No error handling for duplicate or invalid server entries

approach_outcome.description: Added MCP server state and actions to app store
key_achievements: Expanded app store to support MCP server management

recommendations: Add input validation for MCP server configurations
Implement error handling for server management actions
Consider performance optimization for large server lists
Add unit tests for new server management methods
